headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Quanta Services (PWR) Strong 2025 Results And Higher 2026 Profit Guidance
summary: In February 2026, Quanta Services reported fourth-quarter 2025 results showing sales rising to US$7,841.95 million and net income reaching US$315.45 million, alongside full-year 2025 revenues of US$28.48 billion and net income of US$1.03 billion. The company also issued full-year 2026 guidance calling for revenues of US$33.25–US$33.75 billion and net income of US$1.27–US$1.38 billion, highlighting management’s confidence backed by a record backlog and expanding large-load infrastructure...

The company also issued full-year 2026 guidance calling for revenues of US$33.25–US$33.75 billion and net income of US$1.27–US$1.38 billion, highlighting management’s confidence backed by a record backlog and expanding large-load infrastructure...
